trends: there have been no other sightings in malibu\overlookingocean
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: i was on mydeck over looking the ocean when we saw the light from above
divs: sighting detailsmy friend and i rented on of the band members of thr "moodie blues" homes during the summer of 81 we slept on the deck to watch the stars. what ido rember is seeing an increadible beam of ligt bearing down on the "hemphill property(the road is called blue bird lane) this is just above corral cayon\the73 station.what i do rember is seeing the light running naked down the dirt road.my next memory is watching a huge ship pass overhead and falling asleep. greg and i never spoke of this(he was my roomate). only after reading communion did my memeroies come to the surface. ibelieve that i was showen horrible events that were in our future. im not a crack pot . as a matter of fact my father was a gs-17 attached to wright patt and then reassinged to edwards afb\area 51 maybe he would only say he was in nevada.to lend creadability to this my dad held\holds several patenets for avanonics. the last one that im aware of was for the airforce one in yhe late 60's early 70's it was an antenna off the rear stabilser(i think that was the placement)iam very interested in being regressed\hypothinesed,either way i know what i know and thats ok
